text: Smolyan Province is a province in Bulgaria. The capital city is also named Smolyan. ==Municipalities== Smolyan Province has 10 municipalities.Oblast Haskovo The following table shows the names of each municipality, the main town or village (towns are shown in bold), and the population of each as of December 2009. Municipality Pop. Town/Village Pop. title: Smolyan Province
